patthana24.5:4.1: Nahetuṃ nosaññojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu saññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.5:6.1: Nahetuṃ noganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu gantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.5:8.1: Nahetuṃ nooghaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ogho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.5:10.1: Nahetuṃ noyogaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu yogo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.5:12.1: Nahetuṃ nonīvaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu nīvaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.5:14.1: Nahetuṃ noparāmāsaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu parāmāso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
